import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { CSVLink } from "react-csv"; import csvExample from '../images/csv-example.png'; class Instructions extends Component { state = {} render() { const exportData = [['Serial Number', 'Series', 'Denomination', 'Issue Date']] return (
PRICING BONDS BY SPREADSHEET
STEP 1

Download the CSV Template

STEP 2

  1. Open up the CSV Template in Microsoft Excel or similar application.

  2. For each of your bonds, insert a new row into the spreadsheet. Here are two valid examples of how to do this:
STEP 3 Navigate to the BOND PRICING > SPREADSHEET page.
Import your CSV file using the ATTACHMENT field at the top of that page.
) } } export default Instructions;
